properties.name: application.security.jwt.access-token.validity-minutes
properties.description: Number of minutes an Access Token will be valid for.

properties.name: application.security.jwt.refresh-token.validity-days
properties.description: Number of days a Refresh Token will be valid for.

properties.name: application.security.jwt.keystore.location
properties.description: JKS file location for signing JWTs.

properties.name: application.security.jwt.key-alias
properties.description: Alias (from JKS) used for JWT signing.
